mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.MEMBER_PWD , A.TEMP_PWD_YN , A.PHONE , A.EMAIL , A.BIRTHDAY , A.ADDRESS , A.GENDER , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.DEL_DATE , A.MEMBER_ST , B.MEMBER_ID REF_MEMBER_ID , B.AUTHORITY_CODE REF_AUTHORITY_CODE , C.AUTHORITY_CODE REF_AUTHORITY_CODE2 , C.AUTHORITY_NAME , C.AUTHORITY_DESC FROM TB_MEMBER A LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER_ROLE B ON (A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN TB_AUTHORITY C ON (B.AUTHORITY_CODE = C.AUTHORITY_CODE) WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{ username }

SELECT A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.MEMBER_PWD , A.TEMP_PWD_YN , A.PHONE , A.EMAIL , A.BIRTHDAY , A.ADDRESS , A.GENDER , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.DEL_DATE , A.MEMBER_ST , B.MEMBER_ID REF_MEMBER_ID , B.AUTHORITY_CODE REF_AUTHORITY_CODE , C.AUTHORITY_CODE REF_AUTHORITY_CODE2 , C.AUTHORITY_NAME , C.AUTHORITY_DESC , S.MEMBER_ID , S.STUDENT_TYPE REF_MEMBER_ID2 , S.SCHOOL_NAME , S.SCHOOL_GRADE , S.SCHOOL_CLASS , S.CONSULT , D.MEMBER_ID REF_MEMBER_ID3 , D.PARENTS_TYPE , D.PARENTS_NAME , D.PHONE , P.MEMBER_ID REF_MEMBER_ID4 , F.FILE_ID , F.FILE_ORGNAME , F.FILE_SAVENAME , F.FILE_PATH , F.FILE_TYPE , F.FILE_THUM_PATH , F.FILE_THUM_NAME FROM TB_MEMBER A LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER_ROLE B ON (A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN TB_AUTHORITY C ON (B.AUTHORITY_CODE = C.AUTHORITY_CODE) LEFT JOIN TB_STUDENT S ON (A.MEMBER_ID = S.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN TB_PARENTS D ON (A.MEMBER_ID = D.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN TB_PROFILE P ON (A.MEMBER_ID = P.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN TB_FILE F ON (P.FILE_ID = F.FILE_ID) WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{ username }
